onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
Please select your language:

ŸÖŸÜ ŸÅÿ∂ŸÑŸÉ ÿßÿØÿÆŸÑ ÿßŸÑŸÑÿ∫ÿ©
Welcome to ParentText. Every parent everywhere needs support. We hope we can help. üíö
The tips you will receive in this programme have been developed with support from Sanadak, Anar for Empowerment and Psychosocial Support, World Without Orphans, and Parenting for Lifelong Health.

üß° You are a great parent. Thank you for joining us. 

‚úÖ Participating in ParentText is optional.
‚úÖ We won‚Äôt ever ask for your name. Anything you share is safe, private, and anonymous.
‚úÖYour anonymous information may also be shared with others working to help families like yours build strength and hope in tough times. All your information will be private and can‚Äôt be linked back to you.
‚ùåYou can stop when you want. Just type {STOP}
ParentText Terms and Conditions are available here: {consent_link}.
Press YES if you understand and want to receive ParentText. Type 'EXIT' if you do not wish to participate.
onboarding_survey.confirmation.question: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please press NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message: That's okay. If you decide you want these tips later, type HELLO.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: Thank you! ü§≤ We hope these tips will help you build strength and hope for you and your family.
‚ùîBefore we get started, we have a few questions to make this journey personalised:
üì≤ How would you prefer to receive content ‚Äîthrough mostly text / images or with audio guides?
Are you a WOMAN or MAN?
How many children do you take care of?
These tips are designed for those who look after children. Would you still like to receive the tips so you can share the advice with friends and family?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: I do not want the tips

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: This is a very difficult and dangerous time for you and your family. These tips might be different from what you need right now. What would you like to do?
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: I do not want the tips
onboarding_survey.stop.conditions.1.message: That's okay. If you decide you want these tips later, type HELLO.

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text: What is your current living situation?
onboarding_survey.choices.1.text: Living in a camp or shelter
onboarding_survey.choices.2.text: Living in a house or apartment

onboarding_survey.messages.1.text:
Thanks for answering our questions. We're ready to get started. üíö
To start, you can watch this video to learn about ParentText.

consent_data.msg: The tips you will receive in this programme have been developed with support from Sanadak, Anar for Empowerment and Psychosocial Support, World Without Orphans, and Parenting for Lifelong Health.

üß° You are a great parent. Thank you for joining us. 

‚úÖ Participating in ParentText is optional.
‚úÖ We won‚Äôt ever ask for your name. Anything you share is safe, private, and anonymous.
‚úÖYour anonymous information may also be shared with others working to help families like yours build strength and hope in tough times. All your information will be private and can‚Äôt be linked back to you.

consent_data.metadata.description:
{STOP} placeholder: do not edit
{consent_link} placeholder: do not edit

consent_data.msg: ParentText Terms and Conditions are available here: {consent_link}.
Press YES if you understand and want to receive ParentText. Type 'EXIT' if you do not wish to participate.
consent_data.metadata.description:
YES needs to be consistent with "yes_option"
EXIT needs to be consistent with "exit_option"

consent_data.msg: Are you sure you do not want to get these messages? If you do not want to receive any more messages, please type NO. If you made a mistake, please press BACK and choose another option.
consent_data.metadata.description:
BACK needs to be consistent with "back_option"
NO needs to be consistent with "stop_option"

consent_data.msg: That's okay. If you decide you want these tips later, type HELLO.
Thank you! ü§≤ We hope these tips will help you build strength and hope for you and your family.
